description: A Full-Stack web application, where users can reserve home services like Electrician, Plumber, Gardening etc. User can also delete the reservation. The Admin can add new services and delete existing services.

Food-On-Rails is a website for managing food inventory and creating/publishing recipes. Ideal for food enthusiasts seeking organization and recipe inspiration. It has a user authentication system with special privileges.
A website with 4 pages to explore the space. The UI of the website is taken from a Figma file provided by Frontend Mentor.
A web application for RSM Mathematics Exhibition 2022 that allow users to get information about the program.
